about_the_game:
You've just started college, every time you spot a female figure, your gaze wanders and you start to feel your dick throbbing. In the faculty library you come across (or it finds you) a notebook: the Sex Note. The name promises and you don't hesitate to take it home.

When you open the notebook in your room, Yuuna appears, a sexy Yokugami (Goddess of Desire), owner of the Sex Note, who made you find the notebook in order to have fun.

When the Goddess of Desire appears, you are in for a shock. She explains who she is and that with the notebook you can fuck whoever you want. You are hopelessly turned on by both the Yokugami and the usefulness of the notebook.

You feel that your desires are being fulfilled and you can't help imagining the girls you want to sleep with on top of you:

❤️ Jin is an 18 year old dedicated girl in her first year of college. She is a girl who goes from home to college and back, although she might make some interesting stops at your house from now on. She's your classmate and sits two tables ahead of you, your favorite moment is when she gets up to present her work and you stare at her protruding ass as if it were the dessert you're about to eat.

❤️ Kimi is 20 years old, hardworking and dreamy, in the afternoons you can find her as an employee in the supermarket below your house. It's great to be able to do your shopping and be served kindly by this beauty. In addition, they now have a service to take your shopping home....

❤️ Azumi is your older stepsister, she is 23 years old, she stands out for her wisdom and thoughtfulness. She loves spending time with her best friend at home. You've been living together for 3 years and you try not to masturbate thinking about her, it's unethical, but it's hard when she walks around the house in light clothes and is so affectionate.... But of course, you know she's untouchable.

❤️ Kata is 23 years old and is your stepsister's best friend. She is energetic and somewhat absent-minded, sometimes forgetting to wear a bra. You practically met her at the same time as Azumi. You get along well and often include her in your plans at home. Kata likes to dress boldly and that makes her continually arouse your naughty cock.

And last but not least: 💜 Yuuna, the Goddess who could make your wet desires come true. Her age is unknown. What you can know is what stands out the most about her: naughty, funny and, of course, morbid. The moment you touch the notebook, she's with you, both her and her eminent curves. You're going to try to write her name in the notebook, and you know it.

short_description: At university, you come across a notebook: the Sex Note. It reminds you of some manga (wink wink), and you feel ridiculous taking it with you, but it's handy to cover up the erection caused by your fantasies. You can’t resist trying it; the idea of fucking the girls you like the most turns you on.
